items.sentence: I doubt that we\'ll be allowed to do that here.
You haven\'t lived in Boston as long as I have.
You never told me that you didn\'t like Boston.
I wonder whether or not Tom has studied French.
I wonder whether or not Tom still remembers me.
I wonder whether or not Tom was here yesterday.
I wonder whether or not Tom will come tomorrow.
I just don\'t want to be left completely alone.
I just want to make sure that you\'re prepared.
Tom is currently serving three years in prison.
Tom is probably the best student in this class.
Tom is the one who actually pulled the trigger.
Tom left the house without even saying goodbye.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what needed to be done.
Tom gave them a general idea of what he wanted.
Tom graduated from high school three years ago.
There is no way I\'m letting you do this alone.
Tom noticed that Mary seemed to be mad at John.
Tom opened the window to let in some fresh air.
Tom paused a moment to read what the sign said.
Perhaps I shouldn\'t go to Boston this weekend.
Please pick me up at the hotel at six o\'clock.
Why did you have to stay in Boston for so long?
What Tom said doesn\'t apply in this situation.
Let\'s quit fighting before somebody gets hurt.
Let\'s see if Tom can do that without any help.
Let\'s talk about what to do with the stranger.
I\'ll be back home toward the end of the month.
How many cups of coffee do you drink every day?
How many eggs do you usually eat for breakfast?
How many people did you invite to your wedding?
Tom is Mary\'s second cousin, I\'m pretty sure.
I\'d really like to know what Tom\'s secret is.
When was the last time you had a real vacation?
When was the last time you replaced the filter?
I suspect that Tom isn\'t the one who did that.
I\'ve bought some cream puffs. Do you want one?
There are so many stories I\'ve never told you.
Tom and Mary were sitting at the kitchen table.
I suspect Tom knows why Mary doesn\'t like him.
Tom went back to where he had met Mary earlier.
Tom went duck hunting a couple of weekends ago.
Were you able to do what you were trying to do?
I\'ll stay in Boston for at least one more day.
I\'ll tell you what Tom said if you want me to.
I want you to know that Tom\'s important to me.
We lost the game because we were overconfident.
We need to get this done before we can go home.
Let\'s hope that\'s the last time that happens.
Let\'s make sure we\'ve got everything we need.
